Today in Pembrokeshire, St Brides Bay and Tenby are both clean and fun at 2 ft @ 7s S with a light 10 mph ENE breeze. Best surf times are from 08:26 to 16:12 at St Brides Bay and 08:24 to 16:11 at Tenby. Tomorrow, conditions drop as the swell weakens to 2 ft @ 6s SE across all spots, making it less appealing. By the day after, the surf fades further to 1 ft @ 4s NE, with fresh 18 mph ENE winds making it blown out. Best: today.
